title: A New Earth
author: Eckhart Tolle
description: A profound spiritual manifesto that shows how transcending ego-based consciousness is essential to personal happiness and the key to ending conflict and suffering.
summary: Eckhart Tolle guides readers on a journey to enlightenment by shifting from ego-based thinking to conscious presence, helping them find purpose, peace, and fulfillment.

title: Ikigai
author: Héctor García & Francesc Miralles
description: An inspiring and practical guide to living a life full of meaning and purpose based on the Japanese concept of Ikigai.
summary: Explores how finding your ikigai—your reason for being—can lead to a longer, more fulfilling life, combining insights from Japanese philosophy, mindfulness, and longevity.

title: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck
author: Mark Manson
description: A brutally honest guide to living a better life by caring less about more and more about less.
summary: Mark Manson delivers no-nonsense advice about embracing life's challenges, letting go of toxic positivity, and focusing on what truly matters.

title: Atomic Habits
author: James Clear
description: A revolutionary guide to making good habits, breaking bad ones, and getting 1% better every day.
summary: A revolutionary guide to making good habits, breaking bad ones, and getting 1% better every day.

title: The Forty Rules of Love
author: Elif Shafak
description: A tale of love and spiritual awakening inspired by Rumi and his companion Shams of Tabriz, woven through the story of a modern-day woman.
summary: Elif Shafak intertwines two narratives—one contemporary and one historical—exploring the mystical dimensions of love, spirituality, and the human soul.

title: The Alchemist
author: Paulo Coelho
description: A magical tale of Santiago, an Andalusian shepherd boy, who embarks on a journey to find a worldly treasure.
summary: A magical tale of Santiago, an Andalusian shepherd boy, who embarks on a journey to find a worldly treasure.

title: The Psychology of Money
author: Morgan Housel
description: Morgan Housel explores the unique behaviors and mindsets that shape financial success and decision-making.
summary: Morgan Housel explores the unique behaviors and mindsets that shape financial success and decision-making.
